page.title: 08BRISTOL FRUITERER/FLORIST
page.content: {WESTBURY PARK We moved here from south Bristol because we like the area the people are intereresting and the downs are close. Our customers our very musical. housewives, students, young people on the dole but mainly professional people we also have a large passing trade attached to the newspaper shop next door. There has not been much change, a new cinema and "Waitrose", a swell housing development to replace prefabs built upon bomb damage. I'm in the shop with my husband and my son does the heavy work along with helping to serve. We buy vegetables from the market. We have to get there at 5:45 a.m. to get a good place. Supplies come from the U.S.A., Chile, Kenya, Israel, and other countries. Chrysanthamums and seasonal flowers are the mainstay of our flower trade.
